metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13286 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the functionJBIG2Stream::readTextRegionSeg() located at JBIG2Stream.cc. It can, forexample, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppmtool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
